definition: to hand over/to pass on sth/to gradually increase or decrease/progressively
to push/to cut/to refuse/to reject/to decline/to shirk (responsibility)/to put off/to delay/to push forward/to nominate/to elect/massage

sentences.english: The recurrence formula of the time-constant of the sensor is also given.
sentences.chinese: 本文还提出了传感器时间常数的实时递推计算方法。

sentences.english: There is a recursive formula for the number of spanning trees in a graph.
sentences.chinese: 对于一个图的生成树的棵数，存在一个递推公式。

sentences.english: Generating functions are an ideal tool for studying sequences defined by recurrence .
sentences.chinese: 母函数是研究用递推关系来确定的函数的最理想工具。

sentences.english: Jones matrix based step-down iteration synthesis procedure for filter of this kind is proposed.
sentences.chinese: 提出了一种基于琼斯矩阵的反向递推设计方法。

sentences.english: And recursive LSM formulas with weights using moving window are presented.
sentences.chinese: 并给出了带移动窗的加权最小二乘递推公式。

sentences.english: A method for calculating the interlobe sealing line with ordered corresponding points and a recurrence formula are proposed.
sentences.chinese: 提出了对应点序列法与递推公式来求齿面密封线长度。

sentences.english: In this paper, Two Different Concepts for the Recursion of Least Square Estimation is Introduced.
sentences.chinese: 本文阐述了两类不同概念的递推最小二乘估计。

sentences.english: The updating equation of image Jacobian matrix is also given.
sentences.chinese: 此外还给出了图像雅可比矩阵的递推公式。

sentences.english: The solution of the equation set is obtained by means of reflection transmittance coefficient matrix algorithm.
sentences.chinese: 借助反射透射系数阵递推算法，得出了方程组的解。

sentences.english: Kalman filtering is the recursive version of ihe first estimate.
sentences.chinese: 卡尔曼滤波即是线性最小方差估计的递推形式。

sentences.english: A variable-order recursive extended least squares method and a new criterion of order estimation is derived in the paper .
sentences.chinese: 本文给出变阶式递推增广的最小二乘法及阶估计准则。

sentences.english: In the sixth chapter, we study the recurrence relations on the Thiele and Thiele-werner continued fraction GVRI.
sentences.chinese: 第六章研究广义逆复向量连分式有理插值的递推关系。

sentences.english: This program for CFP uses a new recursive formula which includes explicitly the boson seniority number.
sentences.chinese: 计算母分系数使用了包含辛弱数的递推公式。

sentences.english: Making this inference requires stitching those two fragments of information together.
sentences.chinese: 使用这个递推需要将两个片段信息拼接起来。

sentences.english: From recurrence formula is derived the formulation of determining the number and location of pressure-release pond.
sentences.chinese: 用递推法导出确定减压池级数及位置的计算公式。

sentences.english: RFFT is a recursive algorithm based on Fast Fourier Transformation.
sentences.chinese: 是一种基于快速付立叶变换的递推算法。

definition: rules of calculation (addition, subtraction, multiplication and division)/algorithm/fig. to scheme/to calculate (i.e. plot)
elimination (math)/to eliminate one variable from equations
